Shadimus found this interesting, was this Nightlight's
vioce he was hearing- had he developed the ability to
commune with other sparks? There was only one way to
know for sure.

"Just call me your friendly neighbourhood ancient
Cybertronian." he sent with a wink. "Don't ask me how
this is happening if it really is, but maybe it has to
do with me coming back from the other side. I need
proof- if this is really happening, quickly turn on
and off your comm link 3."

Shadowcaster waited for a reply.

 --- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Nighlight::

"Who???? How???"Nighlight thought, she only knew that
only a bot 
could contact sparks and she tought that.. no he
wasn't he couldn't 
be; his spark once kind and warn was become evil...
so, who was?? 
before that she could tought more a warn and
conforting feeling 
sorround her and she started to feel comforted. She
thought "Who're 
you?"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
<cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster could sense something was wrong with
one
> of the crew, something which while not greatly
> troubling him, gave him cause to question just what
> coming back from the martrix can do to the spark of
a
> Transformer.
> 
> 'Is this what happens to bots who come back from the
> other side?' he thought to himself.
> 
> Drawing on zen meditation techniques which he'd
> downloaded during one trip to earth during the great
> war, Shadowcaster let himself relax, letting the
> sensation take hold, before focusing on where it
might
> be coming from, the vague details becoming more
> specific, until he finally had a clear picture in
his
> mind of who it was and what was going on.
> 
> Reaching through the matrix directly to her spark,
he
> started to comfort her.
> 
> "You, know, as long as we have those around us who
> love usw and care about us, we are never truly
alone."
> 
> At the same time, he sent her reassuring feelings
that
> se was loved and cared about.
